domains.description: Runtime domain exposes JavaScript runtime by means of remote evaluation and mirror objects. Evaluation results are returned as mirror object that expose object type, string representation and unique identifier that can be used for further object reference. Original objects are maintained in memory unless they are either explicitly released or are released along with the other objects in their object group.

types.description: Primitive value which cannot be JSON-stringified.
Mirror object referencing original JavaScript object.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Object type.

properties.name: subtype
properties.description: Object subtype hint. Specified for object type values only.

properties.name: className
properties.description: Object class (constructor) name. Specified for object type values only.

properties.name: value
properties.description: Remote object value in case of primitive values or JSON values (if it was requested).

properties.name: unserializableValue
properties.description: Primitive value which can not be JSON-stringified does not have value, but gets this property.

properties.name: description
properties.description: String representation of the object.

properties.name: objectId
properties.description: Unique object identifier (for non-primitive values).

properties.name: preview
properties.description: Preview containing abbreviated property values. Specified for object type values only.

types.description: Object containing abbreviated remote object value.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Object type.

properties.name: subtype
properties.description: Object subtype hint. Specified for object type values only.

properties.name: description
properties.description: String representation of the object.

properties.name: overflow
properties.description: True iff some of the properties or entries of the original object did not fit.

properties.name: properties
properties.description: List of the properties.

properties.name: entries
properties.description: List of the entries. Specified for map and set subtype values only.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Property name.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Object type. Accessor means that the property itself is an accessor property.

properties.name: value
properties.description: User-friendly property value string.

properties.name: valuePreview
properties.description: Nested value preview.

properties.name: subtype
properties.description: Object subtype hint. Specified for object type values only.

properties.name: key
properties.description: Preview of the key. Specified for map-like collection entries.

properties.name: value
properties.description: Preview of the value.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Property name or symbol description.

properties.name: value
properties.description: The value associated with the property.

properties.name: writable
properties.description: True if the value associated with the property may be changed (data descriptors only).

properties.name: get
properties.description: A function which serves as a getter for the property, or undefined if there is no getter (accessor descriptors only).

properties.name: set
properties.description: A function which serves as a setter for the property, or undefined if there is no setter (accessor descriptors only).

properties.name: configurable
properties.description: True if the type of this property descriptor may be changed and if the property may be deleted from the corresponding object.

properties.name: enumerable
properties.description: True if this property shows up during enumeration of the properties on the corresponding object.

properties.name: wasThrown
properties.description: True if the result was thrown during the evaluation.

properties.name: isOwn
properties.description: True if the property is owned for the object.

properties.name: symbol
properties.description: Property symbol object, if the property is of the symbol type.

types.description: Object internal property descriptor. This property isn't normally visible in JavaScript code.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Conventional property name.

properties.name: value
properties.description: The value associated with the property.

types.description: Represents function call argument. Either remote object id objectId, primitive value, unserializable primitive value or neither of (for undefined) them should be specified.

properties.name: value
properties.description: Primitive value.

properties.name: unserializableValue
properties.description: Primitive value which can not be JSON-stringified.

properties.name: objectId
properties.description: Remote object handle.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Unique id of the execution context. It can be used to specify in which execution context script evaluation should be performed.

properties.name: origin
properties.description: Execution context origin.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Human readable name describing given context.

properties.name: auxData
properties.description: Embedder-specific auxiliary data.

types.description: Detailed information about exception (or error) that was thrown during script compilation or execution.

properties.name: text
properties.description: Exception text.

properties.name: scriptId
properties.description: Script ID of the exception location.

properties.name: lineNumber
properties.description: Line number of the exception location (0-based).

properties.name: columnNumber
properties.description: Column number of the exception location (0-based).

properties.name: url
properties.description: URL of the exception location, to be used when the script was not reported.

properties.name: stackTrace
properties.description: JavaScript stack trace if available.

types.description: Stack entry for runtime errors and assertions.

properties.name: functionName
properties.description: JavaScript function name.

properties.name: scriptId
properties.description: JavaScript script id.

properties.name: url
properties.description: JavaScript script name or url.

properties.name: lineNumber
properties.description: JavaScript script line number (0-based).

properties.name: columnNumber
properties.description: JavaScript script column number (0-based).

types.description: Call frames for assertions or error messages.

properties.name: description
properties.description: String label of this stack trace. For async traces this may be a name of the function that initiated the async call.

properties.name: callFrames
properties.description: JavaScript function name.

properties.name: parent
properties.description: Asynchronous JavaScript stack trace that preceded this stack, if available.

commands.name: evaluate

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: Expression to evaluate.

parameters.name: objectGroup
parameters.description: Symbolic group name that can be used to release multiple objects.

parameters.name: includeCommandLineAPI
parameters.description: Determines whether Command Line API should be available during the evaluation.

parameters.name: doNotPauseOnExceptionsAndMuteConsole
parameters.description: Specifies whether evaluation should stop on exceptions and mute console. Overrides setPauseOnException state.

parameters.name: contextId
parameters.description: Specifies in which execution context to perform evaluation. If the parameter is omitted the evaluation will be performed in the context of the inspected page.

parameters.name: returnByValue
parameters.description: Whether the result is expected to be a JSON object that should be sent by value.

parameters.name: generatePreview
parameters.description: Whether preview should be generated for the result.

parameters.name: userGesture
parameters.description: Whether execution should be treated as initiated by user in the UI.

parameters.name: awaitPromise
parameters.description: Whether execution should wait for promise to be resolved. If the result of evaluation is not a Promise, it's considered to be an error.

returns.name: wasThrown
returns.description: True if the result was thrown during the evaluation.

commands.description: Evaluates expression on global object.

commands.name: awaitPromise

parameters.name: promiseObjectId
parameters.description: Identifier of the promise.

parameters.name: returnByValue
parameters.description: Whether the result is expected to be a JSON object that should be sent by value.

parameters.name: generatePreview
parameters.description: Whether preview should be generated for the result.

returns.name: result
returns.description: Promise result. Will contain rejected value if promise was rejected.

returns.name: wasThrown
returns.description: True if the promise was rejected.

returns.name: exceptionDetails
returns.description: Exception details if stack strace is available.

commands.description: Add handler to promise with given promise object id.

commands.name: callFunctionOn

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: Identifier of the object to call function on.

parameters.name: functionDeclaration
parameters.description: Declaration of the function to call.

parameters.name: arguments
parameters.description: Call arguments. All call arguments must belong to the same JavaScript world as the target object.

parameters.name: doNotPauseOnExceptionsAndMuteConsole
parameters.description: Specifies whether function call should stop on exceptions and mute console. Overrides setPauseOnException state.

parameters.name: returnByValue
parameters.description: Whether the result is expected to be a JSON object which should be sent by value.

parameters.name: generatePreview
parameters.description: Whether preview should be generated for the result.

parameters.name: userGesture
parameters.description: Whether execution should be treated as initiated by user in the UI.

parameters.name: awaitPromise
parameters.description: Whether execution should wait for promise to be resolved. If the result of evaluation is not a Promise, it's considered to be an error.

returns.name: wasThrown
returns.description: True if the result was thrown during the evaluation.

commands.description: Calls function with given declaration on the given object. Object group of the result is inherited from the target object.

commands.name: getProperties

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: Identifier of the object to return properties for.

parameters.name: ownProperties
parameters.description: If true, returns properties belonging only to the element itself, not to its prototype chain.

parameters.name: accessorPropertiesOnly
parameters.description: If true, returns accessor properties (with getter/setter) only; internal properties are not returned either.

parameters.name: generatePreview
parameters.description: Whether preview should be generated for the results.

returns.name: internalProperties
returns.description: Internal object properties (only of the element itself).

commands.description: Returns properties of a given object. Object group of the result is inherited from the target object.

commands.name: releaseObject

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: Identifier of the object to release.

commands.description: Releases remote object with given id.

commands.name: releaseObjectGroup

parameters.name: objectGroup
parameters.description: Symbolic object group name.

commands.description: Releases all remote objects that belong to a given group.

commands.name: run
commands.description: Tells inspected instance(worker or page) that it can run in case it was started paused.

commands.name: enable
commands.description: Enables reporting of execution contexts creation by means of executionContextCreated event. When the reporting gets enabled the event will be sent immediately for each existing execution context.

commands.name: disable
commands.description: Disables reporting of execution contexts creation.

commands.name: discardConsoleEntries
commands.description: Discards collected exceptions and console API calls.

commands.name: compileScript

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: Expression to compile.

parameters.name: sourceURL
parameters.description: Source url to be set for the script.

parameters.name: persistScript
parameters.description: Specifies whether the compiled script should be persisted.

parameters.name: executionContextId
parameters.description: Specifies in which execution context to perform script run. If the parameter is omitted the evaluation will be performed in the context of the inspected page.

commands.description: Compiles expression.

commands.name: runScript

parameters.name: scriptId
parameters.description: Id of the script to run.

parameters.name: executionContextId
parameters.description: Specifies in which execution context to perform script run. If the parameter is omitted the evaluation will be performed in the context of the inspected page.

parameters.name: objectGroup
parameters.description: Symbolic group name that can be used to release multiple objects.

parameters.name: doNotPauseOnExceptionsAndMuteConsole
parameters.description: Specifies whether script run should stop on exceptions and mute console. Overrides setPauseOnException state.

parameters.name: includeCommandLineAPI
parameters.description: Determines whether Command Line API should be available during the evaluation.

parameters.name: returnByValue
parameters.description: Whether the result is expected to be a JSON object which should be sent by value.

parameters.name: generatePreview
parameters.description: Whether preview should be generated for the result.

parameters.name: awaitPromise
parameters.description: Whether execution should wait for promise to be resolved. If the result of evaluation is not a Promise, it's considered to be an error.

returns.name: wasThrown
returns.description: True if the result was thrown during the execution.

commands.description: Runs script with given id in a given context.

events.name: executionContextCreated

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: A newly created execution contex.

events.description: Issued when new execution context is created.

events.name: executionContextDestroyed

parameters.name: executionContextId
parameters.description: Id of the destroyed context

events.description: Issued when execution context is destroyed.

events.name: executionContextsCleared
events.description: Issued when all executionContexts were cleared in browser

events.name: exceptionThrown
events.description: Issued when exception was thrown and unhandled.

parameters.name: exceptionId
parameters.description: Exception id.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp of the exception.

parameters.name: exception
parameters.description: Exception object.

parameters.name: executionContextId
parameters.description: Identifier of the context where exception happened.

events.name: exceptionRevoked
events.description: Issued when unhandled exception was revoked.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Message describing why exception was revoked.

parameters.name: exceptionId
parameters.description: The id of revoked exception, as reported in exceptionUnhandled.

events.name: consoleAPICalled
events.description: Issued when console API was called.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of the call.

parameters.name: args
parameters.description: Call arguments.

parameters.name: executionContextId
parameters.description: Identifier of the context where the call was made.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Call timestamp.

parameters.name: stackTrace
parameters.description: Stack trace captured when the call was made.

domains.description: Debugger domain exposes JavaScript debugging capabilities. It allows setting and removing breakpoints, stepping through execution, exploring stack traces, etc.

properties.name: scriptId
properties.description: Script identifier as reported in the Debugger.scriptParsed.

properties.name: lineNumber
properties.description: Line number in the script (0-based).

properties.name: columnNumber
properties.description: Column number in the script (0-based).

properties.name: callFrameId
properties.description: Call frame identifier. This identifier is only valid while the virtual machine is paused.

properties.name: functionName
properties.description: Name of the JavaScript function called on this call frame.

properties.name: functionLocation
properties.description: Location in the source code.

properties.name: location
properties.description: Location in the source code.

properties.name: scopeChain
properties.description: Scope chain for this call frame.

properties.name: this
properties.description: this object for this call frame.

properties.name: returnValue
properties.description: The value being returned, if the function is at return point.

types.description: JavaScript call frame. Array of call frames form the call stack.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Scope type.

properties.name: object
properties.description: Object representing the scope. For global and with scopes it represents the actual object; for the rest of the scopes, it is artificial transient object enumerating scope variables as its properties.

properties.name: startLocation
properties.description: Location in the source code where scope starts

properties.name: endLocation
properties.description: Location in the source code where scope ends

properties.name: lineNumber
properties.description: Line number in resource content.

properties.name: lineContent
properties.description: Line with match content.

commands.name: enable
commands.description: Enables debugger for the given page. Clients should not assume that the debugging has been enabled until the result for this command is received.

commands.name: disable
commands.description: Disables debugger for given page.

commands.name: setBreakpointsActive

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: New value for breakpoints active state.

commands.description: Activates / deactivates all breakpoints on the page.

commands.name: setSkipAllPauses

parameters.name: skipped
parameters.description: New value for skip pauses state.

commands.description: Makes page not interrupt on any pauses (breakpoint, exception, dom exception etc).

commands.name: setBreakpointByUrl

parameters.name: lineNumber
parameters.description: Line number to set breakpoint at.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL of the resources to set breakpoint on.

parameters.name: urlRegex
parameters.description: Regex pattern for the URLs of the resources to set breakpoints on. Either url or urlRegex must be specified.

parameters.name: columnNumber
parameters.description: Offset in the line to set breakpoint at.

parameters.name: condition
parameters.description: Expression to use as a breakpoint condition. When specified, debugger will only stop on the breakpoint if this expression evaluates to true.

returns.name: breakpointId
returns.description: Id of the created breakpoint for further reference.

returns.name: locations
returns.description: List of the locations this breakpoint resolved into upon addition.

commands.description: Sets JavaScript breakpoint at given location specified either by URL or URL regex. Once this command is issued, all existing parsed scripts will have breakpoints resolved and returned in locations property. Further matching script parsing will result in subsequent breakpointResolved events issued. This logical breakpoint will survive page reloads.

commands.name: setBreakpoint

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Location to set breakpoint in.

parameters.name: condition
parameters.description: Expression to use as a breakpoint condition. When specified, debugger will only stop on the breakpoint if this expression evaluates to true.

returns.name: breakpointId
returns.description: Id of the created breakpoint for further reference.

commands.description: Sets JavaScript breakpoint at a given location.

commands.name: removeBreakpoint
commands.description: Removes JavaScript breakpoint.

commands.name: continueToLocation

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Location to continue to.

parameters.name: interstatementLocation
parameters.description: Allows breakpoints at the intemediate positions inside statements.

commands.description: Continues execution until specific location is reached.

commands.name: stepOver
commands.description: Steps over the statement.

commands.name: stepInto
commands.description: Steps into the function call.

commands.name: stepOut
commands.description: Steps out of the function call.

commands.name: pause
commands.description: Stops on the next JavaScript statement.

commands.name: resume
commands.description: Resumes JavaScript execution.

commands.name: searchInContent

parameters.name: scriptId
parameters.description: Id of the script to search in.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: String to search for.

parameters.name: caseSensitive
parameters.description: If true, search is case sensitive.

parameters.name: isRegex
parameters.description: If true, treats string parameter as regex.

commands.description: Searches for given string in script content.

commands.name: canSetScriptSource
commands.description: Always returns true.

commands.name: setScriptSource

parameters.name: scriptId
parameters.description: Id of the script to edit.

parameters.name: scriptSource
parameters.description: New content of the script.

parameters.name: preview
parameters.description: If true the change will not actually be applied. Preview mode may be used to get result description without actually modifying the code.

returns.name: callFrames
returns.description: New stack trace in case editing has happened while VM was stopped.

returns.name: stackChanged
returns.description: Whether current call stack  was modified after applying the changes.

commands.description: Edits JavaScript source live.

commands.name: restartFrame

parameters.name: callFrameId
parameters.description: Call frame identifier to evaluate on.

commands.description: Restarts particular call frame from the beginning.

commands.name: getScriptSource

parameters.name: scriptId
parameters.description: Id of the script to get source for.

commands.description: Returns source for the script with given id.

commands.name: setPauseOnExceptions

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Pause on exceptions mode.

commands.description: Defines pause on exceptions state. Can be set to stop on all exceptions, uncaught exceptions or no exceptions. Initial pause on exceptions state is none.

commands.name: evaluateOnCallFrame

parameters.name: callFrameId
parameters.description: Call frame identifier to evaluate on.

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: Expression to evaluate.

parameters.name: objectGroup
parameters.description: String object group name to put result into (allows rapid releasing resulting object handles using releaseObjectGroup).

parameters.name: includeCommandLineAPI
parameters.description: Specifies whether command line API should be available to the evaluated expression, defaults to false.

parameters.name: doNotPauseOnExceptionsAndMuteConsole
parameters.description: Specifies whether evaluation should stop on exceptions and mute console. Overrides setPauseOnException state.

parameters.name: returnByValue
parameters.description: Whether the result is expected to be a JSON object that should be sent by value.

parameters.name: generatePreview
parameters.description: Whether preview should be generated for the result.

returns.name: result
returns.description: Object wrapper for the evaluation result.

returns.name: wasThrown
returns.description: True if the result was thrown during the evaluation.

commands.description: Evaluates expression on a given call frame.

commands.name: setVariableValue

parameters.name: scopeNumber
parameters.description: 0-based number of scope as was listed in scope chain. Only 'local', 'closure' and 'catch' scope types are allowed. Other scopes could be manipulated manually.

parameters.name: variableName
parameters.description: Variable name.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: New variable value.

parameters.name: callFrameId
parameters.description: Id of callframe that holds variable.

commands.description: Changes value of variable in a callframe. Object-based scopes are not supported and must be mutated manually.

commands.name: getBacktrace

returns.name: callFrames
returns.description: Call stack the virtual machine stopped on.

commands.description: Returns call stack including variables changed since VM was paused. VM must be paused.

commands.name: setAsyncCallStackDepth

parameters.name: maxDepth
parameters.description: Maximum depth of async call stacks. Setting to 0 will effectively disable collecting async call stacks (default).

commands.description: Enables or disables async call stacks tracking.

commands.name: setBlackboxPatterns

parameters.name: patterns
parameters.description: Array of regexps that will be used to check script url for blackbox state.

commands.description: Replace previous blackbox patterns with passed ones. Forces backend to skip stepping/pausing in scripts with url matching one of the patterns. VM will try to leave blackboxed script by performing 'step in' several times, finally resorting to 'step out' if unsuccessful.

commands.name: setBlackboxedRanges

parameters.name: scriptId
parameters.description: Id of the script.

commands.description: Makes backend skip steps in the script in blackboxed ranges. VM will try leave blacklisted scripts by performing 'step in' several times, finally resorting to 'step out' if unsuccessful. Positions array contains positions where blackbox state is changed. First interval isn't blackboxed. Array should be sorted.

events.name: scriptParsed

parameters.name: scriptId
parameters.description: Identifier of the script parsed.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL or name of the script parsed (if any).

parameters.name: startLine
parameters.description: Line offset of the script within the resource with given URL (for script tags).

parameters.name: startColumn
parameters.description: Column offset of the script within the resource with given URL.

parameters.name: endLine
parameters.description: Last line of the script.

parameters.name: endColumn
parameters.description: Length of the last line of the script.

parameters.name: executionContextId
parameters.description: Specifies script creation context.

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: Content hash of the script.

parameters.name: executionContextAuxData
parameters.description: Embedder-specific auxiliary data.

parameters.name: isInternalScript
parameters.description: Determines whether this script is an internal script.

parameters.name: isLiveEdit
parameters.description: True, if this script is generated as a result of the live edit operation.

parameters.name: sourceMapURL
parameters.description: URL of source map associated with script (if any).

parameters.name: hasSourceURL
parameters.description: True, if this script has sourceURL.

parameters.name: deprecatedCommentWasUsed
parameters.description: True, if '//@ sourceURL' or '//@ sourceMappingURL' was used.

events.description: Fired when virtual machine parses script. This event is also fired for all known and uncollected scripts upon enabling debugger.

events.name: scriptFailedToParse

parameters.name: scriptId
parameters.description: Identifier of the script parsed.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL or name of the script parsed (if any).

parameters.name: startLine
parameters.description: Line offset of the script within the resource with given URL (for script tags).

parameters.name: startColumn
parameters.description: Column offset of the script within the resource with given URL.

parameters.name: endLine
parameters.description: Last line of the script.

parameters.name: endColumn
parameters.description: Length of the last line of the script.

parameters.name: executionContextId
parameters.description: Specifies script creation context.

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: Content hash of the script.

parameters.name: executionContextAuxData
parameters.description: Embedder-specific auxiliary data.

parameters.name: isInternalScript
parameters.description: Determines whether this script is an internal script.

parameters.name: sourceMapURL
parameters.description: URL of source map associated with script (if any).

parameters.name: hasSourceURL
parameters.description: True, if this script has sourceURL.

parameters.name: deprecatedCommentWasUsed
parameters.description: True, if '//@ sourceURL' or '//@ sourceMappingURL' was used.

events.description: Fired when virtual machine fails to parse the script.

events.name: breakpointResolved

parameters.name: breakpointId
parameters.description: Breakpoint unique identifier.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Actual breakpoint location.

events.description: Fired when breakpoint is resolved to an actual script and location.

events.name: paused

parameters.name: callFrames
parameters.description: Call stack the virtual machine stopped on.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Pause reason.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Object containing break-specific auxiliary properties.

parameters.name: hitBreakpoints
parameters.description: Hit breakpoints IDs

parameters.name: asyncStackTrace
parameters.description: Async stack trace, if any.

events.description: Fired when the virtual machine stopped on breakpoint or exception or any other stop criteria.

events.name: resumed
events.description: Fired when the virtual machine resumed execution.

domains.description: This domain is deprecated - use Runtime or Log instead.

properties.name: source
properties.description: Message source.

properties.name: level
properties.description: Message severity.

properties.name: text
properties.description: Message text.

properties.name: url
properties.description: URL of the message origin.

properties.name: line
properties.description: Line number in the resource that generated this message (1-based).

properties.name: column
properties.description: Column number in the resource that generated this message (1-based).

commands.name: enable
commands.description: Enables console domain, sends the messages collected so far to the client by means of the messageAdded notification.

commands.name: disable
commands.description: Disables console domain, prevents further console messages from being reported to the client.

commands.name: clearMessages
commands.description: Does nothing.

events.name: messageAdded

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Console message that has been added.

events.description: Issued when new console message is added.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: New repeat count value.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp of most recent message in batch.

types.description: CPU Profile node. Holds callsite information, execution statistics and child nodes.

properties.name: callFrame
properties.description: Function location.

properties.name: hitCount
properties.description: Number of samples where this node was on top of the call stack.

properties.name: children
properties.description: Child nodes.

properties.name: deoptReason
properties.description: The reason of being not optimized. The function may be deoptimized or marked as don't optimize.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Unique id of the node.

properties.name: positionTicks
properties.description: An array of source position ticks.

properties.name: startTime
properties.description: Profiling start time in seconds.

properties.name: endTime
properties.description: Profiling end time in seconds.

properties.name: samples
properties.description: Ids of samples top nodes.

properties.name: timestamps
properties.description: Timestamps of the samples in microseconds.

types.description: Specifies a number of samples attributed to a certain source position.

properties.name: line
properties.description: Source line number (1-based).

properties.name: ticks
properties.description: Number of samples attributed to the source line.

commands.name: setSamplingInterval

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: New sampling interval in microseconds.

commands.description: Changes CPU profiler sampling interval. Must be called before CPU profiles recording started.

events.name: consoleProfileStarted

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Location of console.profile().

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Profile title passed as argument to console.profile().

events.description: Sent when new profile recodring is started using console.profile() call.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Location of console.profileEnd().

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Profile title passed as argunet to console.profile().

types.description: Sampling Heap Profile node. Holds callsite information, allocation statistics and child nodes.

properties.name: callFrame
properties.description: Function location.

properties.name: selfSize
properties.description: Allocations size in bytes for the node excluding children.

properties.name: children
properties.description: Child nodes.

parameters.name: reportProgress
parameters.description: If true 'reportHeapSnapshotProgress' events will be generated while snapshot is being taken when the tracking is stopped.

parameters.name: reportProgress
parameters.description: If true 'reportHeapSnapshotProgress' events will be generated while snapshot is being taken.

parameters.name: objectGroup
parameters.description: Symbolic group name that can be used to release multiple objects.

commands.name: addInspectedHeapObject

parameters.name: heapObjectId
parameters.description: Heap snapshot object id to be accessible by means of $x command line API.

commands.description: Enables console to refer to the node with given id via $x (see Command Line API for more details $x functions).

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: Identifier of the object to get heap object id for.

returns.name: heapSnapshotObjectId
returns.description: Id of the heap snapshot object corresponding to the passed remote object id.

parameters.name: samplingInterval
parameters.description: Average sample interval in bytes. Poisson distribution is used for the intervals. The default value is 32768 bytes.

events.name: lastSeenObjectId
events.description: If heap objects tracking has been started then backend regulary sends a current value for last seen object id and corresponding timestamp. If the were changes in the heap since last event then one or more heapStatsUpdate events will be sent before a new lastSeenObjectId event.

events.name: heapStatsUpdate
events.description: If heap objects tracking has been started then backend may send update for one or more fragments

parameters.name: statsUpdate
parameters.description: An array of triplets. Each triplet describes a fragment. The first integer is the fragment index, the second integer is a total count of objects for the fragment, the third integer is a total size of the objects for the fragment.
